abstract: Returns the services provided by the File Provider extension that manages the item at the given URL.

declaration.code: func getFileProviderServicesForItem(at url: URL, completionHandler: @escaping ([NSFileProviderServiceName : NSFileProviderService]?, (any Error)?) -> Void)

overview:
## Discussion

Use the returned services to perform custom actions defined by the services’ protocol.

To access the service:

The listing below shows a sample implementation for accessing a File Provider service’s remote proxy object.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileProviderService#Defining-the-Services-Protocol].

items.description: A service that provides a custom communication channel between your app and a File Provider extension.
items.name: NSFileProviderService

items.description: The name used to identify a File Provider service.
items.name: NSFileProviderServiceName

title: getFileProviderServicesForItem(at:completionHandler:)
